document_data.name: Jenila
document_data.mainbody: '''Jenila''' was a [[noble marid]] who inhabited [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|81}}
document_data.Activities: Jenila spent a good deal of time within the [[White Agate's Tower]], associating with the [[White Agate]] and helping him guard his possessions.
document_data.Relationships: She enjoyed spending time with the White Agate because she believed him to be one of the few humans who approached her level of intelligence. They were close friends because of this.
document_data.Rumors and Legends: It was widely rumored among the students of the tower that the White Agate and Jenila were lovers.
